name: JQ: dogs & cats
description:
JQ: dogs & cats - is a quiz game about dogs and cats in which a player must choose the correct answer from 4 options.
- 2 game modes (dogs and cats)
- 60+ levels
- Pleasant music
- Steam Achievements
Credits: This game was created using Clickteam Fusion 2.5! Music by Erwarda Savitnaag.
